title: Ticket #102: Build/Test web pages: Overhaul
description:
The current build/test web pages are old code that's been copy/pasted all over and riddled with one-off hacks. It's slow, fragile, and resistant to change. We should overhaul it.

1) Share more code. Perhaps make it single file that uses arguments to get the final result.

2) Perhaps move to Perl? More of the FW group is fluent in Perl than PHP.

This is probably strongly linked to #101 about improving our use of the database.
